title: Troy Deeney off the mark as Watford overcome in-form Stoke (PFA - Professional Footballers' Association) ...
text: ( Source : PFA - Professional Footballers' Association ) Troy Deeney notched his first goal of the season as Watford ended Stoke 's winning run by beating them 2-0 at the Britannia Stadium . The Hornets skipper - who netted 21 times in the
